portfolios.title: Hookt - Loyalty App
portfolios.body: Hookt is a mobile application for Android or iOS that offers an alternative to Stamp / Clip based loyalty programs.
portfolios.author: Adrian Evans

portfolios.title: Burger Logger
portfolios.body: Burger Logger allows the user to capture burgers they want to consume and then log consumed burgers.
portfolios.author: Adrian Evans

portfolios.title: Workout Tracker
portfolios.body: The Workout Tracker allows the user to log workouts and view a summary of workouts on a dashboard.
portfolios.author: Adrian Evans

portfolios.title: WeatherCheck
portfolios.body: This is a basic weather search application that allows the user search current and 5 day forecasted weather for a specified location.
portfolios.author: Adrian Evans

portfolios.title: Potter || Lotter - API Project
portfolios.body: Potter or LOTR (pronounced /'lɒtər/) is a quiz based on the series Lord of the Rings (LOTR) and Harry Potter (Potter).
portfolios.author: Adrian Evans, Marco Jansen, Nadia Flam, Abbie Barker

portfolios.title: Password Factory
portfolios.body: The Password Factory is a webpage that is designed to generate a password based on user specified criteria.
portfolios.author: Adrian Evans
